name: VALENTINES DAY: HAWKS
description:
✪ SLIGHT MY HERO ACADEMIA SPOILERS ✪

This game is set after the manga ends (currently years after chapter 379). No major spoilers but some references to the manga.

A short visual novel wherein you and Hawks have been neighbors for several months, and you have finally mustered up the courage to tell him your feelings.

Featuring:

★ Choices with special dialogue!

★ 4 different character customizations!

★ indulgent Hawks art by yours truly

This is a game for simps, Hawks stans, and really anyone who has an appreciation for the red bird man.  

This is my first-ever coding project and I'm very excited to show it to you, and I learned a lot through this process. I hope you enjoy, and wish you a happy valentines day!
